item.title: Predicting Mechanical Properties of Non-Equimolar High-Entropy Carbides using Machine Learning
item.description:
Xi Zhao, Shu-guang Cheng, S. F. Yu, Jiming Zheng, Ruizhi Zhang, Meng Guo, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405265950
High-entropy carbides (HECs) have garnered significant attention due to their unique mechanic properties. However, the design of novel HECs has been limited by extensive trial-and-error strategies, along with insufficient knowledge...
item.author: Xi Zhao, Shu-guang Cheng, S. F. Yu, Jiming Zheng, Ruizhi Zhang, Meng Guo

item.title: Acquisition of absorption and fluorescence spectral data using chatbots
item.description:
Masahiko Taniguchi, Jonathan S. Lindsey, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405421036
Spectra – the lifeblood of photochemistry – have been very difficult to find in the literature. Chatbots, remarkably, may enable their more efficient acquisition and prove to be generally powerful tools for searching the scientific literature.
item.author: Masahiko Taniguchi, Jonathan S. Lindsey

item.title: A Hitchhiker's Guide to Deep Chemical Language Processing for Bioactivity Prediction
item.description:
Rıza Özçelik, Francesca Grisoni, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405454695
Deep learning has significantly accelerated drug discovery, with 'chemical language' processing (CLP) emerging as a prominent approach. CLP learns from molecular string representations (e.g., Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry Systems...
item.author: Rıza Özçelik, Francesca Grisoni
